mapper.sql:
SELECT T.TNO, T.COURSE_CATEGORY, T.COURSE_CATEGORY_NM, T.AREA_GU, T.DISTANCE, T.LEAD_TIME, T.COURSE_LEVEL, T.RELATE_SUBWAY, T.TRAFFIC_INFO, T.CONTENT, T.COURSE_NAME, T.DETAIL_COURSE, T.CPI_NAME, T.CPI_CONTENT, T.LATITUDE, T.LONGITUDE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY_TRACKING R WHERE T.TNO = R.TNO AND R.STATUS='Y') as reviewCount
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLIP_TRACKING C WHERE T.TNO = C.TNO AND MEMNO = ${memNo}) as isClip
FROM TRACKING T LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT TNO FROM REPLY_TRACKING) as R ON (T.TNO = R.TNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT TNO FROM CLIP_TRACKING) as C ON (T.TNO = C.TNO)
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRACKING where 1=1
AND ( COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR COURSE_CATEGORY_NM LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR CPI_NAME LIKE '%${searchValue}%' )
SELECT tRno, tNo, memNo, WRITER, WRITER_NAME, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM REPLY_TRACKING WHERE STATUS ='Y' AND tNo= ${tNo}

SELECT * FROM TRACKING
ORDER BY RAND() limit 8;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TRACKING( TRno, tNo, memNo, WRITER, WRITER_NAME, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES( 0, #{tNo}, #{memNo}, #{writer}, #{writerName}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY_TRACKING SET CONTENT=#{content}, MODIFY_DATE= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TRNO=#{tRno}
mapper.insert: DELETE FROM CLIP_TRACKING WHERE MEMNO=#{memNo} AND TNO=#{tNo}
